00055 WorldMap::WorldMap(QWidget* widget)
00056         :QWidget(widget), m_rightAscension( 0 ), m_declination( 0 ), m_azimuth( 0 ), m_zenith( 0 )
00057 {
00058         m_gray = new Image(":/icons/WorldMapGray.BMP");
00059         m_map.load( ":/icons/mundo.BMP" );
00060         m_sun.load( ":/icons/sunIcon.png" );
00061         m_position.load( ":/icons/position.png" );
00062         m_sun = m_sun.scaledToWidth( 15 );
00063         m_position = m_position.scaledToWidth( 15 );
00064 
00065 }

00069

00072 void WorldMap::mouseMoveEvent( QMouseEvent* e)
00073 {
00074         int x=e->x();
00075         int y=e->y();
00076 
00077         if( x < m_map.width() && y < m_map.height() )
00078         {
00079                 //Change tool tip
00080                 QString country = m_gray->country( x, y );
00081                 if ( !( country == "EMPTY" ) )  QToolTip::showText( e->globalPos(), country );
00082                 else    QToolTip::showText( e->globalPos(), "" );
00083         }
00084 
00085 }

00089         m_latitude = latitude;
00090 }

00092 void WorldMap::LocalLongitudeChanged( double longitude )
00093 {
00094         m_longitude = longitude;

00097 void WorldMap::SunChanged( cSunCoordinates coordinates )
00098 {
00099         int width = m_map.width();
00100         int height = m_map.height();
00101 
00102         m_rightAscension = coordinates.dRightAscension;
00103         m_declination = coordinates.dDeclination;
00104 
00105         double hourAngle = coordinates.dHourAngle;
00106         int division = (int ) ( ( hourAngle - m_longitude * tgc::Degree )/ tgc::TwoPi );
00107         double remainPart = (hourAngle - m_longitude * tgc::Degree ) - ( division * tgc::TwoPi );
00108         m_hourAngle = remainPart;
00109 
00110         m_azimuth = coordinates.dAzimuth;
00111         m_zenith = coordinates.dZenithAngle;
00112 
00113         double sx = cos( m_declination ) * cos( m_hourAngle );
00114         double sy = -cos( m_declination) * sin( m_hourAngle );
00115         double sz = sin( m_declination );
00116 
00117         if ( sz == 0 ) sz = 0.0000000000001;
00118 
00119         m_points.clear();
00120 
00121         for( int x = 0; x < width; ++x )
00122         {
00123                 double lon = ( ( x * tgc::TwoPi ) / width ) - tgc::Pi;
00124                 double lat = atan( - ( sx * cos( lon ) + sy * sin( lon )  ) / sz );
00125                 int y = int ( ( height/ 2 ) - ( ( lat * ( height/ 2 ) ) / ( tgc::Pi/ 2) ) );
00126                 m_points.append( QPoint( x, y ) );
00127 
00128         }
00129         update();
00130 }
00131 
00132 void WorldMap::paintEvent(QPaintEvent* /*event*/ )
00133 {
00134         QPainter painter( this );
00135         painter.setPen( QPen( Qt::darkGreen, 2, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::RoundCap ) );
00136         //painter.setBrush( QBrush( Qt::darkGreen, Qt::SolidPattern ) );
00137 
00138         if( m_points.size() > 0 )
00139         {
00140 
00141 
00142                 QImage alpha( m_map.width(), m_map.height(), QImage::Format_RGB32 );
00143 
00144                 QImage copy( m_map.width(), m_map.height(), QImage::Format_RGB32 );
00145                 for( int x = 0; x< m_map.width(); ++x )
00146                 {
00147                         for( int y1 = 0; y1 < m_points[x].y(); ++y1 )
00148                         {
00149                                 QColor color = QColor::fromRgb ( m_map.pixel( x, y1 ) );
00150                                 QColor pixelColor;
00151                                 if( m_declination > 0 ) pixelColor = color.lighter ( 110 );
00152                                 else pixelColor = color.lighter ( 70 );
00153                                 copy.setPixel( x, y1, pixelColor.rgb() );
00154                         }
00155                         for( int y2 = m_points[x].y(); y2 < m_map.height(); y2++ )
00156                         {
00157                                 QColor color = QColor::fromRgb ( m_map.pixel( x, y2 ) );
00158                                 QColor pixelColor;
00159                                 if( m_declination < 0 ) pixelColor = color.lighter ( 110 );
00160                                 else    pixelColor = color.lighter ( 70 );
00161                                 copy.setPixel( x, y2, pixelColor.rgb() );
00162                         }
00163 
00164                 }
00165 
00166                 painter.drawImage(0, 0, copy );
00167 
00168                 QVector< QPoint > points;
00169                 points.append( m_points[0] );
00170                 for( int index = 0; index < m_points.size()-1; ++index )
00171                 {
00172                         points.append( m_points[index] );
00173                         //points.append( m_points[index] );
00174                 }
00175                 points.append( m_points[m_points.size()-1] );
00176                 painter.drawLines( points );
00177 
00178                 int x = int ( ( ( -m_hourAngle + tgc::Pi) * m_map.width() ) / tgc::TwoPi );
00179                 if( x < 0 )     x = m_map.width() + x;
00180                 int y = int ( (m_map.height()/ 2) + ( (-m_declination   * ( m_map.height()/ 2 ) )  / ( tgc::Pi / 2 ) ) );
00181                 painter.drawImage( x, y - 10, m_sun );
00182 
00183                 x = int ( ( ( m_longitude* tgc::Degree + tgc::Pi) * m_map.width() ) / tgc::TwoPi );
00184                 if( x < 0 )     x = m_map.width() + x;
00185                 y = int ( (m_map.height()/ 2) + ( (-m_latitude* tgc::Degree   * ( m_map.height()/ 2 ) )  / ( tgc::Pi / 2 ) ) );
00186                 painter.drawImage( x, y-10, m_position );
00187 
00188 
00189                 //Draw Text
00190                 painter.setPen( QPen( Qt::black, 2, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::RoundCap ) );
00191                 //painter.setFont( QFont( "MS Shell Dlg 2", 8 ) );
00192                 QString azimuth = QString("Azimuth: %1").arg( QString::number( m_azimuth ) );
00193                 painter.drawText ( 20, 280, azimuth );
00194                 QString zenith = QString("Zenith: %1").arg( QString::number( m_zenith ) );
00195                 painter.drawText ( 20, 310, zenith );
00196                 QString ascension = QString("Right Ascension: %1").arg( QString::number( m_rightAscension ) );
00197                 painter.drawText ( 20, 340, ascension );
00198                 QString declination = QString("Declination: %1").arg( QString::number( m_declination ) );
00199                 painter.drawText ( 20, 370, declination );
00200          }
00201          else   painter.drawImage(0, 0, m_map);
00202 
00203 
00204  }
